    public class Gui
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Provides a graphical user interface for a poker simulator.

        Adds a simulate button to the specified panel.
        Parameters:
        panel - the panel to which the button is added
        hand1 - a text field for the first hand in the simulation
        hand2 - a text field for the second hand in the simulation
        output - the text area in which the result is displayed
